com.android.tickets

Class StationsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<StationsAdapter.StationsClickViewHolder>
      • com.android.tickets.StationsAdapter

  • public class StationsAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<StationsAdapter.StationsClickViewHolder>
    The adapter is used to populate the spinner in the MainActivity
